title.en: Prayer to Tārā: A Sevenfold Supplication for Protection

text.en: I pray to celestial Tārā, the exalted mother,
Who abides within the uncreated dharmadhātu,
From where she bestows comfort and joy upon all:
text.en-trans: dé semchen kün la dé ter ma

text.en: Protect me from all fear.
text.en-trans: dak jikpa kün lé kyab tu sol

text.en: I pray to the divine mother Tārā:
Through not realizing our innate nature to be dharmakāya,
text.en-trans: sem nyönmong wang du gyurpa yi

text.en: Our minds remain under the influence of destructive emotion;
Protect all of us who wander aimlessly in saṃsāra.
text.en-trans: yum lhamo khyö kyi kyab tu sol

text.en: I pray to the genuine deity, mother Tārā:
text.en-trans: chö nying né gyü la ma kyepar

text.en: Protect us in whose hearts the genuine dharma hasn’t been born,
text.en-trans: tanyé tsik gi jé drang né

text.en: Who fixate on words and ideas,
Or who have been deceived by false claims.
text.en-trans: yum yangdak gi lhamö kyab tu sol

text.en: I pray to the deity of mindfulness, mother Tārā:
Protect us who have glimpsed the nature of mind, so difficult to realize,
And yet, due to lack of mindfulness and familiarity,
Remain distracted by negative action.
text.en-trans: yum drenpé lhamö kyab tu sol

text.en: I pray to the deity who is inseparable from my mind, mother Tārā:
Protect us whose strong adherence to and grasping at subject-object duality
Blinds us from realizing
The true nature of mind, non-dual wisdom.
text.en-trans: tuk nyimé kyi lhamö kyab tu sol

text.en: I pray to the deity of omniscience, mother Tārā:
text.en-trans: yangdak gi dön la né jé kyang

text.en: Protect us who, even though we abide in the midst of reality
Fail to recognise cause and effect and mutual dependence
And thus remain in confusion.
text.en-trans: yum künkhyen gyi lhamö kyab tu sol

text.en: I pray to the fully awakened deity, mother Tārā:
Protect us who still remain unaware of the inseparability
Of the unelaborate, sky-like nature,
And everything it pervades.
text.en-trans: yum dzok sangyé kyi kyab tu sol
